name: World Agriculture & Horticulture Conference
content: We are delighted to welcome you to the prestigious “World Agriculture & Horticulture Conference”, which is going to be held during April 20-21, 2020 with a theme “Exploring Next-generation Technologies in Agriculture and Horticulture”. WAHC-2020 aims to accelerate scientific discoveries and major milestones in the current situation, challenges, and innovations relating to agriculture and its relevant areas. Phronesis is sorting out one more anticipated occasion as Farming and Cultivation, 2020\. The meeting will be on April 20-21, 2020 in Dubai, UAE.
